summary.span: 表示键和值的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of keys and values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 泛型类提供一组键到一组值的映射。The generic class provides a mapping from a set of keys to a set of values. 每次对字典的添加都包含一个值和与其关联的键。Each addition to the dictionary consists of a value and its associated key. 使用其键检索值的速度非常快，接近 O (1) ，因为 该类是作为哈希表实现的。Retrieving a value by using its key is very fast, close to O(1), because the class is implemented as a hash table. > [!NOTE] > 检索的速度取决于为指定的类型的哈希算法的质量 `TKey` 。The speed of retrieval depends on the quality of the hashing algorithm of the type specified for `TKey`. 只要对象用作中的键 ，它就不得以任何影响其哈希值的方式进行更改。As long as an object is used as a key in the , it must not change in any way that affects its hash value. 根据字典的相等比较器，中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the dictionary's equality comparer. 键不能为 `null` ，但如果其类型为引用类型，则值可以为 `TValue` 。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if its type `TValue` is a reference type. 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 可以 通过使用接受参数的构造函数来指定泛型接口的实现 `comparer` ; 如果不指定实现，则使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。You can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter; if you do not specify an implementation, the default generic equality comparer is used. 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. > [!NOTE] > 例如，你可以使用类提供的不区分大小写的字符串比较器 来创建具有不区分大小写的字符串键的字典。For example, you can use the case-insensitive string comparers provided by the class to create dictionaries with case-insensitive string keys. 的容量 是可容纳的元素数 。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. **仅 .NET Framework：** 对于非常大的 对象，可以通过 `enabled` [``](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) `true` 在运行时环境中将配置元素的属性设置为，来将64位系统上的最大容量增加到2000000000个元素。**.NET Framework only:** For very large objects, you can increase the maximum capacity to 2 billion elements on a 64-bit system by setting the `enabled` attribute of the [``](/dotnet/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/runtime/gcallowverylargeobjects-element) configuration element to `true` in the run-time environment. 出于枚举目的，字典中的每一项都被视为 表示值及其键的结构。For purposes of enumeration, each item in the dictionary is treated as a structure representing a value and its key. 返回项的顺序是不确定的。The order in which the items are returned is undefined. C `foreach` + + 中的 c # 语言 (的语句 `for each` `For Each` Visual Basic) 返回集合中元素的类型的对象。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) returns an object of the type of the elements in the collection. 由于 是键和值的集合，因此元素类型不是键的类型或值的类型。Since the is a collection of keys and values, the element type is not the type of the key or the type of the value. 相反，元素类型是 键类型和值类型的。Instead, the element type is a of the key type and the value type. 例如:For example: [!code-cpp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/cpp/source2.cpp#11)] [!code-csharp[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/CS/source2.cs#11)] [!code-vb[Generic.Dictionary#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/VB/source2.vb#11)] `foreach`语句是枚举器周围的包装器，它只允许从集合读取，而不允许写入。The `foreach` statement is a wrapper around the enumerator, which allows only reading from the collection, not writing to it. > [!NOTE] > 因为键可以被继承并且其行为发生了更改，所以使用方法进行的比较无法保证其绝对唯一性 。Because keys can be inherited and their behavior changed, their absolute uniqueness cannot be guaranteed by comparisons using the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用字符串键创建一个空的字符串，并使用 方法来添加一些元素。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示了 在尝试添加重复键时方法引发。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 该示例使用 属性 (c # 中的索引器 ) 来检索值，演示在 请求的键不存在时引发的，并显示与键关联的值可以替换。The example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例演示如何使用方法作为更高效的方法来检索值，如果程序必须经常尝试在字典中，不并显示如何使用方法来测试某个键是否存在之前调用方法。The example shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary, and it shows how to use the method to test whether a key exists before calling the method. 该示例演示如何枚举字典中的键和值，以及如何使用属性和属性单独枚举键和值 。The example shows how to enumerate the keys and values in the dictionary and how to enumerate the keys and values alone using the property and the property. 最后，该示例演示 方法。Finally, the example demonstrates the method. [!code-cpp[Generic.Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp-interactive[Generic.Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Generic.Dictionary#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/VB/source.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 只要不修改集合，就可以同时支持多个读取器。

span.span: A can support multiple readers concurrently, as long as the collection is not modified.

threadsafe.span: 尽管如此，枚举集合本身并不是一个线程安全的过程。

span.span: Even so, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 在具有写入访问的枚举竞争的罕见情况下，必须在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。

span.span: In the rare case where an enumeration contends with write accesses, the collection must be locked during the entire enumeration.

threadsafe.span: 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。

span.span: To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization.

threadsafe.span: 有关线程安全的替代，请参阅 类或 类。

span.span: For thread-safe alternatives, see the class or class.

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据默认的相等比较器，中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the default equality comparer. 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 此构造函数使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。This constructor uses the default generic equality comparer, . 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. 或者，您可以 通过使用接受参数的构造函数来指定泛型接口的实现 `comparer` 。Alternatively, you can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter. > [!NOTE] > 如果可以估计集合的大小，则使用指定初始容量的构造函数无需在向中添加元素时执行多个大小调整操作 。If you can estimate the size of the collection, using a constructor that specifies the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用字符串键创建一个空的字符串，并使用 方法来添加一些元素。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示了 在尝试添加重复键时方法引发。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据默认的相等比较器，中的每个键都必须是唯一的; 同样， `dictionary` 根据默认的相等比较器，源中的每个键都必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the default equality comparer; likewise, every key in the source `dictionary` must also be unique according to the default equality comparer. 新的初始容量 足以包含中的所有元素 `dictionary` 。The initial capacity of the new is large enough to contain all the elements in `dictionary`. 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 此构造函数使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。This constructor uses the default generic equality comparer, . 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. 或者，您可以 通过使用接受参数的构造函数来指定泛型接口的实现 `comparer` 。Alternatively, you can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter. 此构造函数是一个 O (n) 操作，其中 n 是中的元素数目 `dictionary` 。This constructor is an O(n) operation, where n is the number of elements in `dictionary`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数来初始化 具有其他字典中已排序内容的。The following code example shows how to use the constructor to initialize a with sorted content from another dictionary. 此代码示例创建一个 ，并用随机顺序填充数据，然后将传递 到 构造函数，从而创建 排序的。The code example creates a and populates it with data in random order, then passes the to the constructor, creating a that is sorted. 如果需要生成一个在某个时间点变为静态的已排序字典，这会很有用;将数据从复制 到可 提高检索速度。This is useful if you need to build a sorted dictionary that at some point becomes static; copying the data from a to a improves retrieval speed. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IDic/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IDic/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此构造函数与类提供的不区分大小写的字符串比较器结合使用 ，以创建具有不区分大小写的字符串键的字典。Use this constructor with the case-insensitive string comparers provided by the class to create dictionaries with case-insensitive string keys. 根据指定的比较器，中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the specified comparer. 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 如果 `comparer` 为 `null` ，则此构造函数使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。If `comparer` is `null`, this constructor uses the default generic equality comparer, . 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. > [!NOTE] > 如果可以估计集合的大小，则使用指定初始容量的构造函数无需在向中添加元素时执行多个大小调整操作 。If you can estimate the size of the collection, using a constructor that specifies the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用当前区域性的不区分大小写的相等比较器创建一个。The following code example creates a with a case-insensitive equality comparer for the current culture. 该示例将添加四个元素，其中一些包含小写键，一些具有大写键。The example adds four elements, some with lower-case keys and some with upper-case keys. 然后，该示例尝试添加一个元素，该元素具有仅大小写不同于现有密钥的键，并捕获产生的异常，并显示一条错误消息。The example then attempts to add an element with a key that differs from an existing key only by case, catches the resulting exception, and displays an error message. 最后，此示例将在字典中显示元素。Finally, the example displays the elements in the dictionary. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IEqC/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IEqC/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根据默认的相等比较器，中的每个键都 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the default equality comparer. 的容量是在 需要调整大小之前可以添加到的元素的数目。The capacity of a is the number of elements that can be added to the before resizing is necessary. 当向添加元素时 ，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量后，无需在将元素添加到时执行多个大小调整操作 。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 此构造函数使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。This constructor uses the default generic equality comparer, . 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. 或者，您可以 通过使用接受参数的构造函数来指定泛型接口的实现 `comparer` 。Alternatively, you can specify an implementation of the generic interface by using a constructor that accepts a `comparer` parameter. 此构造函数是一个 O (1) 操作。This constructor is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个初始容量为4的字典，并使用4个条目来填充它。The following code example creates a dictionary with an initial capacity of 4 and populates it with 4 entries. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_Int32/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_Int32/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将此构造函数与类提供的不区分大小写的字符串比较器结合使用 ，以创建具有不区分大小写的字符串键的字典。Use this constructor with the case-insensitive string comparers provided by the class to create dictionaries with case-insensitive string keys. 根据指定的比较器，中的每个键都必须是唯一的; 同样，根据指定的比较器，源中的每个键都 `dictionary` 必须是唯一的。Every key in a must be unique according to the specified comparer; likewise, every key in the source `dictionary` must also be unique according to the specified comparer. > [!NOTE] > 例如，如果 `comparer` 是类提供的不区分大小写的字符串比较 器之一，并且不使用不区分 `dictionary` 大小写的比较器键，则可能会发生重复键。For example, duplicate keys can occur if `comparer` is one of the case-insensitive string comparers provided by the class and `dictionary` does not use a case-insensitive comparer key. 新的初始容量 足以包含中的所有元素 `dictionary` 。The initial capacity of the new is large enough to contain all the elements in `dictionary`. 需要一个相等实现来确定键是否相等。 requires an equality implementation to determine whether keys are equal. 如果 `comparer` 为 `null` ，则此构造函数使用默认的泛型相等比较器 。If `comparer` is `null`, this constructor uses the default generic equality comparer, . 如果类型 `TKey` 实现 泛型接口，则默认的相等比较器将使用该实现。If type `TKey` implements the generic interface, the default equality comparer uses that implementation. 此构造函数是一个 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是中的元素数 `dictionary` 。This constructor is an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is the number of elements in `dictionary`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 构造函数来初始化 另一字典中具有不区分大小写的排序内容的。The following code example shows how to use the constructor to initialize a with case-insensitive sorted content from another dictionary. 此代码示例创建一个 具有不区分大小写的比较器，并用随机顺序填充数据，然后将传递 到 构造函数，以及一个不区分大小写的相等比较器，创建 排序的。The code example creates a with a case-insensitive comparer and populates it with data in random order, then passes the to the constructor, along with a case-insensitive equality comparer, creating a that is sorted. 如果需要生成一个在某个时间点变为静态的已排序字典，这会很有用;将数据从复制 到可 提高检索速度。This is useful if you need to build a sorted dictionary that at some point becomes static; copying the data from a to a improves retrieval speed. > [!NOTE] > 当你使用不区分大小写的比较器创建一个新的字典，并使用使用区分大小写的比较器的字典中的项进行填充时，如本示例中所示，如果输入字典具有仅大小写不同的键，则会出现异常。When you create a new dictionary with a case-insensitive comparer and populate it with entries from a dictionary that uses a case-sensitive comparer, as in this example, an exception occurs if the input dictionary has keys that differ only by case. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IDicIEqC/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_IDicIEqC/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个 初始容量为5的，以及当前区域性的不区分大小写的相等比较器。The following code example creates a with an initial capacity of 5 and a case-insensitive equality comparer for the current culture. 该示例将添加四个元素，其中一些包含小写键，一些具有大写键。The example adds four elements, some with lower-case keys and some with upper-case keys. 然后，该示例尝试添加一个元素，该元素具有仅大小写不同于现有密钥的键，并捕获产生的异常，并显示一条错误消息。The example then attempts to add an element with a key that differs from an existing key only by case, catches the resulting exception, and displays an error message. 最后，此示例将在字典中显示元素。Finally, the example displays the elements in the dictionary. :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_Int32IEqC/CS/source.cs" interactive="try-dotnet" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary.ctor_Int32IEqC/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet1":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 ; 例如， `myCollection[myKey] = myValue` 在 Visual Basic) 中 (`myCollection(myKey) = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the ; for example, `myCollection[myKey] = myValue` (in Visual Basic, `myCollection(myKey) = myValue`). 但是，如果指定的键已存在于中 ，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the , setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 如果具有指定键的值已存在，该方法将引发异常。In contrast, the method throws an exception if a value with the specified key already exists. 如果该 属性值已等于容量，则会 自动重新分配内部数组，并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后再添加新的元素。If the property value already equals the capacity, the capacity of the is increased by automatically reallocating the internal array, and the existing elements are copied to the new array before the new element is added. 如果是引用类型，则键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为 `TValue` 。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if `TValue` is a reference type. 如果 小于容量，则此方法将使用 O (1) 操作。If is less than the capacity, this method approaches an O(1) operation. 如果必须增加容量以容纳新元素，则此方法将变成 O (`n`) 操作，其中 `n` 是 。If the capacity must be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an O(`n`) operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用字符串键创建一个空的字符串，并使用 方法来添加一些元素。The following code example creates an empty of strings with string keys and uses the method to add some elements. 该示例演示了 在尝试添加重复键时方法引发。The example demonstrates that the method throws an when attempting to add a duplicate key. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. :::code language="cpp" source="~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/cpp/source.cpp" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/CS/source.cs" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Generic.Dictionary/VB/source.vb" id="Snippet2":::

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于枚举目的，每个项都是一个 表示值及其键的结构。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure representing a value and its key. C `foreach` + + 中的 c # 语言 (的语句 `for each` `For Each` Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 在读取的值之前，必须调用 方法以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素 。You must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在 调用方法之前，属性将返回相同的元素 。The property returns the same element until the method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 无法再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素；必须改为创建新的枚举器实例。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加元素或更改容量），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将 引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding elements or changing the capacity, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 仅限 .NET Core 3.0 +：不使枚举器无效的唯一改变方法是 和 。.NET Core 3.0+ only: The only mutating methods which do not invalidate enumerators are and . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下 c # 语法访问集合中的特定元素的功能： `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` Visual Basic) 。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置中不存在的键的值 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the . 设置属性值时，如果键在中 ，则与该键关联的值将替换为指定的值。When you set the property value, if the key is in the , the value associated with that key is replaced by the assigned value. 如果键不在中 ，则键和值将添加到字典中。If the key is not in the , the key and value are added to the dictionary. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. 如果值类型为引用类型，则键不能为 `null` ，但值可以为 `TValue` 。A key cannot be `null`, but a value can be, if the value type `TValue` is a reference type. C # 语言使用 [`this`](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [`this`](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 获取或设置此属性的值将接近 O (1) 操作。Getting or setting the value of this property approaches an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 ) c # 中的索引器 (属性来检索值，演示在 请求的键不存在时引发的，并显示与键关联的值可以替换。The following code example uses the property (the indexer in C#) to retrieve values, demonstrating that a is thrown when a requested key is not present, and showing that the value associated with a key can be replaced. 该示例还演示了如何使用 方法作为一种更有效的方法来检索值（如果程序经常需要尝试不在字典中的键值）。The example also shows how to use the method as a more efficient way to retrieve values if a program often must try key values that are not in the dictionary. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. `openWith` 在此示例中使用的字典的名称。`openWith` is the name of the Dictionary used in this example. remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 即使集合是同步的，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这可能会导致枚举器引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which can cause the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 属性返回一个对象，该对象可用于同步对的访问 。The property returns an object that can be used to synchronize access to the . 仅当所有线程在访问集合之前锁定对象时，同步才有效。Synchronization is effective only if all threads lock the object before accessing the collection. 获取此属性的值是一个 O (1) 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 出于枚举目的，每个项都是一个 结构。For purposes of enumeration, each item is a structure. C `foreach` + + 中的 c # 语言 (的语句 `for each` `For Each` Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法还将枚举器恢复到此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置上，未定义 。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在读取的值之前，必须调用 方法，以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素 。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在 调用或方法之前，属性将返回相同的元素 。The property returns the same element until either the or method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加元素或更改容量），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将 引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding elements or changing the capacity, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 仅限 .NET Core 3.0 +：不使枚举器无效的唯一改变方法是 和 。.NET Core 3.0+ only: The only mutating methods which do not invalidate enumerators are and . 枚举数没有对集合的独占访问权；因此，从头到尾对一个集合进行枚举在本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 `foreach` Visual Basic 的 c +) + 中的语句 (在字典中枚举键/值对， `For Each` `for each` 其中隐藏了枚举器的使用。The following code example shows how to enumerate the key/value pairs in the dictionary by using the `foreach` statement (`For Each` in Visual Basic, `for each` in C++), which hides the use of the enumerator. 特别要注意的是，接口的枚举器会 返回 对象而不是 对象。In particular, note that the enumerator for the interface returns objects rather than objects. 此代码示例摘自为方法提供的更大示例，包括输出 。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值是一个 O (1) 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 获取此属性的值是一个 O (1) 操作。Getting the value of this property is an O(1) operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性提供了使用以下 c # 语法访问集合中特定值的功能： `myCollection[key]` `myCollection(key)` 在 Visual Basic) 中 (。This property provides the ability to access a specific value in the collection by using the following C# syntax: `myCollection[key]` (`myCollection(key)` in Visual Basic). 你还可以使用 属性来添加新元素，方法是设置字典中不存在的键的值; 例如 `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue` 。You can also use the property to add new elements by setting the value of a key that does not exist in the dictionary; for example, `myCollection["myNonexistentKey"] = myValue`. 但是，如果字典中已存在指定的键，则设置 属性会覆盖旧值。However, if the specified key already exists in the dictionary, setting the property overwrites the old value. 与此相反， 方法不会修改现有元素。In contrast, the method does not modify existing elements. C # 语言使用 [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) 关键字来定义索引器，而不是实现 属性。The C# language uses the [this](/dotnet/csharp/language-reference/keywords/this) keyword to define the indexers instead of implementing the property. Visual Basic 将 实现为默认属性，该属性提供相同的索引功能。Visual Basic implements as a default property, which provides the same indexing functionality. 获取或设置此属性的值将接近 O (1) 操作。Getting or setting the value of this property approaches an O(1) operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性 (的 c # 中的索引器 ) 中的属性 ，以及与属性不同的方式 。The following code example shows how to use the property (the indexer in C#) of the interface with a , and ways the property differs from the property. 该示例显示，与属性一样 ， 属性可以更改与现有键关联的值，如果指定键不在字典中，则可用于添加新的键/值对。The example shows that, like the property, the property can change the value associated with an existing key and can be used to add a new key/value pair if the specified key is not in the dictionary. 该示例还显示了与属性不同的， 如果不在字典中，则属性不会引发异常 `key` ，而是返回空引用。The example also shows that unlike the property, the property does not throw an exception if `key` is not in the dictionary, returning a null reference instead. 最后，该示例演示 如果不 `key` 是正确的数据类型，获取属性将返回空引用; 如果不 `key` 是正确的数据类型，则设置属性会引发异常。Finally, the example demonstrates that getting the property returns a null reference if `key` is not the correct data type, and that setting the property throws an exception if `key` is not the correct data type. 此代码示例摘自为方法提供的更大示例，包括输出 。The code example is part of a larger example, including output, provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks C `foreach` + + 中的 c # 语言 (的语句 `for each` `For Each` Visual Basic) 隐藏了枚举器的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 方法还将枚举器恢复到此位置。The method also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置， 属性未定义。At this position, the property is undefined. 因此，在读取的值之前，必须调用 方法，以将枚举器前进到集合的第一个元素 。Therefore, you must call the method to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在 调用或方法之前，属性将返回相同的元素 。The property returns the same element until either the or method is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位在集合中最后一个元素之后，并 返回 `false` 。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对的后续调用 也将返回 `false` 。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果最后一次调用 返回 `false` ， 则未定义。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加元素或更改容量），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对或的下一个调用将 引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding elements or changing the capacity, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 仅限 .NET Core 3.0 +：不使枚举器无效的唯一改变方法是 和 。.NET Core 3.0+ only: The only mutating methods which do not invalidate enumerators are and . 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举过程中锁定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要允许多个线程访问集合以进行读写操作，则必须实现自己的同步。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空间中集合的默认实现是不同步的。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. 此方法是 O (1) 操作。This method is an O(1) operation.
